Lawyer’s comments to Family Court judge earn him suspension https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyers-comments-to-family-court-judge-earn-him-suspension/IXCJBBQ4B5HOXAJJQKR5GKTFSU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lawyers-comments-to-family-court-judge-earn-him-suspension/IXCJBBQ4B5HOXAJJQKR5GKTFSU/ Jeremy WilkinsonHe claimed a judge was sexist and labelled the court a "vagina court". Sun, 05 May 2024 02:00:00 +0000 The lawyer became frustrated with the Family Court process and accused the judge, court staff and opposing counsel of bias and sexism. Photo / 123rf
Baby breast milk bank needs donors for Northland’s most vulnerable https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/baby-breast-milk-bank-crying-out-for-support-for-northlands-most-vulnerable/Z3VHP7NN6JCRZA5R4LYAIKDJJQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/baby-breast-milk-bank-crying-out-for-support-for-northlands-most-vulnerable/Z3VHP7NN6JCRZA5R4LYAIKDJJQ/ Denise PiperThe human milk bank still needs $12,000 to get up and running. Sun, 05 May 2024 02:00:00 +0000 The human milk bank will help vulnerable newborn babies get a better start in life by providing them with pasteurised breast milk. Photo / 123rf

Waikato Screen looking at the big picture of region’s film industry https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-screen-looking-at-the-big-picture-of-regions-film-industry/LZ6RROIBZRBSXMCHW7CGEZQLZM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waikato-screen-looking-at-the-big-picture-of-regions-film-industry/LZ6RROIBZRBSXMCHW7CGEZQLZM/ Al WilliamsThe region's screen industry has room to grow. Sun, 05 May 2024 01:39:28 +0000 The second season of The Gone, shot in Te Aroha, stars Irish actor Richard Flood. With support from Waikato Screen, the production brings economic benefits to the rural town.

Weather: More chilly mornings to come after Auckland’s coldest weekend of the year https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-more-chilly-mornings-to-come-after-aucklands-coldest-weekend-of-the-year/5UOZ6YRXLVGXJHYYKRHJE2XXXI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-more-chilly-mornings-to-come-after-aucklands-coldest-weekend-of-the-year/5UOZ6YRXLVGXJHYYKRHJE2XXXI/ Jamie MortonAuckland just had its coldest night in six months, with more chilly weather on the way. Sun, 05 May 2024 00:02:32 +0000 High pressure and clear skies have helped deliver Auckland its coolest temperatures since October, with cold and showery weather on the cards for coming days. Photo / Alex Robertson

Human Rights Review Tribunal orders police to pay sexual assault complainant $50,000 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ human-rights-review-tribunal-orders-police-pay- Sex-assault-complainant-50000/2WFVECJGBRGSPEKMJBO54S7YZI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ human-rights-review-tribunal-orders-police-pay- Sex-assault-complainant-50000/2WFVECJGBRGSPEKMJBO54S7YZI/ Jeremy WilkinsonThe tribunal has also told police to explain why they didn't charge the alleged abuser.
